p: To a solution of SA (15 mg, 0.06 mmol) in DMF (1 mL, freshly distilled from CaH 2), was added K 2CO 3 (25 mg, 0.18 mmol), followed by the addition of dibromoalkane (0.24 mmol). The obtained mixture was then stirred under N 2 atmosphere at 50 °C for 12 h. Afterwards, the reaction mixture was cooled to room temperature and quenched by brine (5 mL). The mixture was then extracted with DCM (5 mL × 3), washed successively with brine (10 mL × 3) and water (10 mL × 3), dried over Na 2SO 4, filtered, and concentrated in vacuo. The residue was purified by silica gel CC (EtOAc/PE ranged from 5:95 to 10:90 depending on the TLC analysis) to yield 15– 20.
